law.catch_line: Enlisted man, discharge of -- Discharge papers.

text.section: An enlisted man shall not be discharged before the expiration of his term of service except by order of the Governor or by sentence of court-martial approved by the Governor. A soldier upon his discharge from service, shall be given a certificate of discharge or report of separation from service.
The types of discharges used shall be the same as those authorized by the National Guard Bureau.

law.history: Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 7. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 10. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2711a-180.
